verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Jesus sweet Rose of Sharon
How dear You are to me
There is no other
No other but Thee

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I lift my hands to You
With joy I now proclaim
Jesus sweet Rose of Sharon
I love that blessed name
